survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and challenges faced by digital nomads regarding their workspace setups while working remotely from various locations.

questions.question_text: How often do you change your work location as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover common digital nomad mobility patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you change your work location as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: What are the top three factors you consider when choosing a workspace? (Select up to three)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Limit to 3 selections to prioritize top factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max selection: 3)

script.question_text: What are the top three factors you consider when choosing a workspace? (Select up to three)

questions.question_text: Describe your biggest challenge in maintaining productivity as a digital nomad.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: Describe your biggest challenge in maintaining productivity as a digital nomad.

questions.question_text: Which of the following tools do you use to find workspaces? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. No limit on selections to understand tool diversity.

script.question_text: Which of the following tools do you use to find workspaces? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workspace setup?
